pageData.text-description:
A simple-yet-powerful API traffic viewer
for Kubernetes to help you troubleshoot
and debug your microservices.
pageData.text-lower-description:
Think TCPDump and Chrome Dev Tools
 combined.
pageData.feature-requests: Real time view of all HTTP requests, REST and gRPC API calls
pageData.quick-download: is a <50MB program (written in Golang) that you can download and run
pageData.note-1: You should have kubectl configured to run against your Kubernetes cluster.
pageData.note-2: Namespace is required in case the pod is in a different namespace than the default one.
pageData.note-3: After mizu starts and successfully connects to the specified pod, a local web interface will become available at http://localhost:8899/
pageData.cli-arguments-subheading: Usage and list of command-line arguments can be seen by running
